text: Reese Witherspoon isn't afraid to get her hands dirty. The actress and star of Disney's upcoming A Wrinkle in Time did just that on Sunday. ` ` I'm running a little bit late for work today, but I heard my friend is really close by, so I wan na go meet her really quick,'' Reese said in a series of clips on Instagram. The ` ` friend'' in question turned out to be her very own star, to which she gave a motivational speech after giving it a good scrubdown. ` ` Now you're looking good, girl,'' the mom of three joked. ` ` That's right.
